Text: OK Gang, very pleased to see quite a few latched on to this one right away, so I am going to put all 4 Volumes up here on TPB for you all to enjoy.   I must point out that the interviews on this collection are every bit as good as the music and I strongly advise you purchase this 4 DVD Box set from http://www.bbc.co.uk/shop if you are a serious lover of music.

Ooops sorry typo my end... Please go here to purchase the 4 DVD Box set:


http://www.bbcshop.com/
